scripts.build: concurrently "rspack build --config rspack.config.js" "cd microfrontend/m_api && rspack build --config rspack.config.js" "cd microfrontend/m_auth && rspack build --config rspack.config.js" "cd microfrontend/m_list && rspack build --config rspack.config.js" "cd microfrontend/m_popup && rspack build --config rspack.config.js" "cd microfrontend/m_register && rspack build --config rspack.config.js"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run serve" "cd microfrontend/m_api && npm run serve" "cd microfrontend/m_auth && npm run serve" "cd microfrontend/m_list && npm run serve" "cd microfrontend/m_popup && npm run serve" "cd microfrontend/m_register && npm run serve"
